entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
